text: Savadhana! Timi ti manche hau ki allahako margama kharca garnaka lagi bola'inchau ta timiharumadhyebata kehi kanjusi garna thalchan ra jasale kanjusya'im gardacha usale ta vastavama aphno jyanasamga kanjusya'im gardacha. Allaha ta data cha timi bhikhari, ra yadi timi mukha pharka'ihala ta tyo timro satta arko kaumala'i lya'idinecha. Jo pheri timi jasta humdainan
